root: ^Me again! Say, I have a lot of pull with the tin traders, interesting fact for you. Here’s another: If you couldn’t get tin here, you’d have to go all the way to the ends of the earth for the next proper mine.
^So if you detect a sense of entitlement, it’s well-earned, wouldn’t you say? With that in mind, send over some of the bronze you’re forging with all that tin. Let’s see how you’re treating it.

Port19: ^Hey, not bad, not bad. We could really learn something from how you forge stuff down there. Keep up the good work, if you want the work to keep up.
